name: sentinel-ai
description: AI-powered code review and analysis tool

scripts.build:clean: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm -r run build
scripts.ci:check: pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test -- --run
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf .sentinel/analytics
scripts.sentinel:rules:validate: pnpm --filter @sentinel/core exec tsx src/scripts/validate-rules.ts --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles
scripts.sentinel:context:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts build-context --profile frontend
scripts.sentinel:context: pnpm -r build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js build-context --profile frontend
scripts.sentinel:review:local:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md review.md --out-json review.json
scripts.sentinel:review:local:nofail:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md review.md --out-json review.json --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:mock:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --provider mock --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md review.md --out-json review.json
scripts.sentinel:review:mock:nofail:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --provider mock --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md review.md --out-json review.json --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:prod: pnpm -r build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md dist/review.md --out-json dist/review.json
scripts.sentinel:review:nofail: pnpm -r build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md dist/review.md --out-json dist/review.json --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:mock: pnpm -r build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --provider mock --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md dist/review.md --out-json dist/review.json
scripts.sentinel:render-md:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-md --in review.json --out review.human.md
scripts.sentinel:render-html:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-html --in review.json --out review.html
scripts.sentinel:render-md: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-md --in dist/review.json --out dist/review.human.md
scripts.sentinel:render-html: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-html --in dist/review.json --out dist/review.html
scripts.sentinel:review:hello:dev: pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile hello-world --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md review.md --out-json review.json --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review:local:analytics: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_ANALYTICS=1 SENTINEL_ANALYTICS_DIR=.sentinel/analytics pnpm --filter @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --provider local --diff fixtures/changes.diff --profile frontend --profiles-dir packages/profiles --out-md dist/review.md --out-json dist/review.json --fail-on none
